scripts.text:
With CTE AS
(
	SELECT 
		[ClientID],
		[ListID],
		[Name],
		[Description],
		[DateCreated],
		[Active],
		[ListType],
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
							PARTITION BY
									[ClientID],
									[ListID],
									[Name],
									[Description],
									[DateCreated],
									[Active],
									[ListType]
							ORDER BY
									[ClientID],
									[ListID],
									[Name],
									[Description],
									[DateCreated],
									[Active],
									[ListType]
						) ROW_NUM

	FROM [Import].[EmailList]
)
DELETE FROM CTE
WHERE ROW_NUM >1

With CTE AS
(
	SELECT 
		[ClientID],
		[SubscriberKey],
		[EmailAddress],
		[SubscriberID],

		ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
							PARTITION BY
									[ClientID],
									[SubscriberKey],
									[EmailAddress],
									[SubscriberID]
							ORDER BY
									[ClientID],
									[SubscriberKey],
									[EmailAddress],
									[SubscriberID]
						) ROW_NUM

	FROM [Import].[EmailAttributes]
)
DELETE FROM CTE
WHERE ROW_NUM >1

With CTE AS
(
	SELECT 
		[ClientID],
		[SendID],
		[FromName],
		[FromEmail],
		[SchedTime],
		[SentTime],
		[Subject],
		[Emailname],
		[TriggeredSendExternalkey],
		[SendDefinitionExternalKey],
		[JobStatus],
		[PreviewURL],
		[IsMultipart],
		[Additional],

		ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
							PARTITION BY
									[ClientID],
									[SendID],
									[FromName],
									[FromEmail],
									[SchedTime],
									[SentTime],
									[Subject],
									[Emailname],
									[TriggeredSendExternalkey],
									[SendDefinitionExternalKey],
									[JobStatus],
									[PreviewURL],
									[IsMultipart],
									[Additional]

							ORDER BY
									[ClientID],
									[SendID],
									[FromName],
									[FromEmail],
									[SchedTime],
									[SentTime],
									[Subject],
									[Emailname],
									[TriggeredSendExternalkey],
									[SendDefinitionExternalKey],
									[JobStatus],
									[PreviewURL],
									[IsMultipart],
									[Additional]
						) ROW_NUM

	FROM [Import].[EmailSendJobs]
)
DELETE FROM CTE
WHERE ROW_NUM >1

With CTE AS
(
	SELECT 
		[ClientID],
		[SendID],
		[SubscriberKey],
		[EmailAddress],
		[SubscriberID],
		[ListID],
		[EventDate],
		[EventType],
		[BatchID],
		[TriggeredExternalKey],
		[CompaignID],

		ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
							PARTITION BY
									[ClientID],
									[SendID],
									[SubscriberKey],
									[EmailAddress],
									[SubscriberID],
									[ListID],
									[EventDate],
									[EventType],
									[BatchID],
									[TriggeredExternalKey],
									[CompaignID]

							ORDER BY
									[ClientID],
									[SendID],
									[SubscriberKey],
									[EmailAddress],
									[SubscriberID],
									[ListID],
									[EventDate],
									[EventType],
									[BatchID],
									[TriggeredExternalKey],
									[CompaignID]
						) ROW_NUM

	FROM [Import].[EmailSent]
)
DELETE FROM CTE
WHERE ROW_NUM >1

With CTE AS
(
	SELECT 
		[ClientID],
		[SendID],
		[SubscriberKey],
		[EmailAddress],
		[SubscriberID],
		[ListID],
		[EventDate],
		[EventType],
		[SendURLID],
		[URLID],
		[URL],
		[Alias],
		[BatchID],
		[TriggeredSendExternalKey],
		[IsUnique],

		ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
							PARTITION BY
									[ClientID],
									[SendID],
									[SubscriberKey],
									[EmailAddress],
									[SubscriberID],
									[ListID],
									[EventDate],
									[EventType],
									[SendURLID],
									[URLID],
									[URL],
									[Alias],
									[BatchID],
									[TriggeredSendExternalKey],
									[IsUnique]

							ORDER BY
									[ClientID],
									[SendID],
									[SubscriberKey],
									[EmailAddress],
									[SubscriberID],
									[ListID],
									[EventDate],
									[EventType],
									[SendURLID],
									[URLID],
									[URL],
									[Alias],
									[BatchID],
									[TriggeredSendExternalKey],
									[IsUnique]
						) ROW_NUM

	FROM [Import].[EmailClicks]
)
DELETE FROM CTE
WHERE ROW_NUM >1

With CTE AS
(
	SELECT 
		[ClientID],
		[SendID],
		[SubscriberKey],
		[EmailAddress],
		[SubscriberID],
		[ListID],
		[EventDate],
		[EventType],
		[BatchID],
		[TriggeredSendExternalKey],
		[IsUnique],

		ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
							PARTITION BY
									[ClientID],
									[SendID],
									[SubscriberKey],
									[EmailAddress],
									[SubscriberID],
									[ListID],
									[EventDate],
									[EventType],
									[BatchID],
									[TriggeredSendExternalKey],
									[IsUnique]

							ORDER BY
									[ClientID],
									[SendID],
									[SubscriberKey],
									[EmailAddress],
									[SubscriberID],
									[ListID],
									[EventDate],
									[EventType],
									[BatchID],
									[TriggeredSendExternalKey],
									[IsUnique]
						) ROW_NUM

	FROM [Import].[EmailOpens]
)
DELETE FROM CTE
WHERE ROW_NUM >1

With CTE AS
(
	SELECT 
		[ClientID],
		[SendID],
		[SubscriberKey],
		[EmailAddress],
		[SubscriberID],
		[ListID],
		[EventDate],
		[EventType],
		[BatchID],
		[TriggeredSendExternalKey],
		[Domain],

		ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
							PARTITION BY
									[ClientID],
									[SendID],
									[SubscriberKey],
									[EmailAddress],
									[SubscriberID],
									[ListID],
									[EventDate],
									[EventType],
									[BatchID],
									[TriggeredSendExternalKey],
									[Domain]

							ORDER BY
									[ClientID],
									[SendID],
									[SubscriberKey],
									[EmailAddress],
									[SubscriberID],
									[ListID],
									[EventDate],
									[EventType],
									[BatchID],
									[TriggeredSendExternalKey],
									[Domain]
						) ROW_NUM

	FROM [Import].[EmailComplaints]
)
DELETE FROM CTE
WHERE ROW_NUM >1

activities.name: Foreach Brand In Player Account Date

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('DECLARE DateStr VARCHAR(10) = ','''',pipeline().parameters.CurrentDate,'''',',',
' ContainerParam VARCHAR(100) =','''', pipeline().parameters.BlobContainerIncomeAccess,'''',',',
' RayGunKey VARCHAR(100) = ','''',pipeline().parameters.RayGunApiKey,'''',',',
' BrandId VARCHAR(100) =','''',variables('Brand'),'''',',',
' AccountName VARCHAR(100) =','''', pipeline().parameters.BlobStorageAccountName,'''',',',
' AccountKey VARCHAR(1024) =','''', pipeline().parameters.BlobStorageAccountKey,'''',

'SELECT ''/C '' + 
	REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ArgumentText, ''DateParam'', DateStr), ''AccountName'', AccountName), ''AccountKey'', AccountKey), ''ContainerParam'', ContainerParam) + '' '' + RayGunKey ArgumentText 
FROM config.IncomeAccessFeed 
WHERE FeedType = ''Player Account''
AND Brand = BrandId
')

@concat('DECLARE DateStr VARCHAR(10) = ','''',pipeline().parameters.CurrentDate,'''',',',
' ContainerParam VARCHAR(100) =','''', pipeline().parameters.BlobContainerIncomeAccess,'''',',',
' RayGunKey VARCHAR(100) = ','''',pipeline().parameters.RayGunApiKey,'''',',',
' BrandId VARCHAR(100) =','''', item(),'''',',',
' AccountName VARCHAR(100) =','''', pipeline().parameters.BlobStorageAccountName,'''',',',
' AccountKey VARCHAR(1024) =','''', pipeline().parameters.BlobStorageAccountKey,'''',

'SELECT ''/C '' + 
	REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ArgumentText, ''DateParam'', DateStr), ''AccountName'', AccountName), ''AccountKey'', AccountKey), ''ContainerParam'', ContainerParam) + '' '' + RayGunKey ArgumentText 
FROM config.IncomeAccessFeed 
WHERE FeedType = ''Earnings By Site''
AND Brand = BrandId
')

dependsOn.activity: Foreach Brand In Player Account Date
